original_text: The Lord says this: ‘It will be very bad for the prophets who tell false messages. They lead my people the wrong way with false promises. If people give food to them, then they are happy. So they promise that there will be no war. But, if people do not feed them, they become angry. They promise that war will come.
korean_text: 내 백성을 유혹하는 선지자들은 이에 물 것이 있으면 평강을 외치나 그 입에 무엇을 채워 주지 아니하는 자에게는 전쟁을 준비하는도다 이런 선지자에 대하여 여호와께서 이르시되

sentences.original_text: It will be very bad for the prophets
They lead my people the wrong way
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 내 백성을 잘못된 길로 인도한다

sentences.original_text: If people give food to them
So they promise that there will be no war
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 전쟁이 없을 것이라고 약속한다

sentences.original_text: But if people do not feed them
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 사람들이 그들에게 먹이를 주지 않으면

sentences.original_text: They promise that war will come
